title: How to Draw Dresses

steps.headline: Look carefully at your girl.
steps.description: Make sure you are satisfied with her appearance before going in for the clothes.

steps.headline: Draw a small loop at the base of her neck like you were going to draw a shirt.
Add some slightly curved lines going down the dress to create folds or ripples in the cloth.
Start with the previous step one.
Now start at the top of the neck hole.
steps.description: Draw two half ovals sideways down it.

steps.headline: Make long sleeves with frill on the ends.
Finish the bottom like the previous dress, but end it with frill like the sleeves.
Don't forget to add the ripples/folds.
Draw a V-Neck that goes down far.
You can add a U for an undershirt, but for maximum sexiness, just draw cleavage.
steps.description: (Hint: This is NOT a good dress for young girls.)

steps.headline: Draw a curvy dress figure.
steps.description: If desired, you can make the dress have tank top sleeves.

steps.headline: Draw the dress covering her feet.
Start from the line at the bottom and do a very slim triangle going up.
steps.description: This should stop just at the top of her thigh.

steps.headline: Erase the bottom of the triangle.
steps.description: It's done! The triangle up the thigh and the low V-neck are what add that sexy element

steps.headline: Finished.
steps.description: Be sure to decorate with any designs you would like.

text: Basic Dress Look carefully at your girl. Make sure you are satisfied with her appearance before going in for the clothes. Draw a small loop at the base of her neck like you were going to draw a shirt.  Continue to draw a shirt.  Make your lines swoop out. Close them at the bottom. Add some slightly curved lines going down the dress to create folds or ripples in the cloth.  Old Timey Dress Start with the previous step one.  Follow the previous step two.  Now start at the top of the neck hole. Draw two half ovals sideways down it. Make long sleeves with frill on the ends.  Finish the bottom like the previous dress, but end it with frill like the sleeves.  Don't forget to add the ripples/folds.  Final Dress for prom Draw a V-Neck that goes down far.  You can add a U for an undershirt, but for maximum sexiness, just draw cleavage. (Hint: This is NOT a good dress for young girls.) Draw a curvy dress figure. If desired, you can make the dress have tank top sleeves. Draw the dress covering her feet.  Start from the line at the bottom and do a very slim triangle going up. This should stop just at the top of her thigh. Erase the bottom of the triangle. It's done! The triangle up the thigh and the low V-neck are what add that sexy element Finished. Be sure to decorate with any designs you would like.
